firstNightReminder: The City guard chooses 2 players, show whether any of them is an outsider.
otherNightReminder: The City guard chooses 2 players, show whether any of them is an outsider.
name: City guard
ability: Each night, choose 2 players (not yourself): learn if any of them is an outsider.

firstNightReminder: Show thumbs down or thumbs up.
otherNightReminder: Show thumbs down or thumbs up.
name: Celebrity
ability: Players who choose you with their ability at night learn your character.

firstNightReminder: The Houndmaster chooses a player, show thumbs down or thumbs up.
otherNightReminder: The Houndmaster chooses a player, show thumbs down or thumbs up.
name: Houndmaster
ability: Each night*, choose a player: learn if any of their townsfolk neighbour is dead.

otherNightReminder: The Graverobber may choose a player.
name: Graverobber
ability: Once per game, at night, choose a player: learn their character and gain their ability. If you choose a demon or alive player, you are drunk.

otherNightReminder: Show 2 character tokens.
name: Conspirator
ability: Each night, choose a player. Learn how many times they were chosen by other players at night.

otherNightReminder: If the Angler has chosen a player during the day and 3 or more players are dead, they both may die.
name: Angler
ability: Each day, you may publicly choose a player (different to last day): you and that player can't die tonight. If 3 or more players are dead, one of you might die tonight instead.

otherNightReminder: If the Shaman died tonight, show him a number.
name: Shaman
ability: If you died today or tonight, learn how many dead players are evil.

name: Pastor
ability: If a townsfolk was executed today, no townsfolk can die tonight.

otherNightReminder: If the Falconer died tonight, show thumbs up or thumbs down.
name: Falconer
ability: If you die at night, choose a player: learn if they or any of their neighbours are a demon.

otherNightReminder: The Surgeon may choose a player.
name: Surgeon
ability: Once per game, at night*, choose a player: if they are a townsfolk, they die. Otherwise, they are resurrected.

name: Girlfriend
ability: You start knowing a good player. That player is drunk while you are alive.

otherNightReminder: The Monster choses a player.
name: Monster
ability: Minions are good and know you are in the game.

otherNightReminder: The Organ donor may die and the other player may be resurrected.
name: Organ donor
ability: Each day, you may publicly ask another player what their character is. If they don't lie, you die tonight and they are resurrected.

otherNightReminder: The homeless may die.
name: Homeless
ability: Each night*, one of your good neighbours die. Each day, if one alive player agrees, you are both drunk until dusk.

otherNightReminder: A Voayeur's victim may die tonight.
name: Voayeur
ability: You start knowing a character in play. They are drunk until you can guess which player it is.

otherNightReminder: The Acolyte may choose an alive player.
name: Acolyte
ability: If you die, choose an alive player. They become a demon.

otherNightReminder: The Zombie may be resurrected.
name: Monster
ability: learns who you are

otherNightReminder: Judas may choose a player.
name: Judas
ability: when you are nominated, publicly choose a player:

otherNightReminder: A demon is resurrected if this is the first time a demon died.
name: Rasputin
ability: Each night, choose a player: They die and are resurrected next night.

otherNightReminder: The Cockroach might learn who the evil demons are.
name: The Cockroach
ability: When you die, evil wins after 3 dusks.

otherNightReminder: If The Goat was executed today, the player who nominated them becomes evil.
name: The Goat
ability: 3 good players know you are in the game. One of them dies each night. When all die, you are resurrected.

otherNightReminder: Nyrtho chooses a player.
name: Nyrtho
ability: Each night*, choose 2 players with no presents: they choose whether to unwrap your present. If they do, they die. If 3 presents are unwrapped, evil wins

otherNightReminder: Ghuul chooses a player.
name: Ghuul
ability: When a player dies, they live but become other characters.

otherNightReminder: Camazotti guesses up to 3 players.
name: Camazotti
ability: Each other player is woken at night: they might choose to kill one of their neighbours, if no one does, evil wins. [3x Three Kings]

otherNightReminder: Chernobog chooses a player.
name: Chernobog
